long_description: Carry the versatile Brunton Double-Back LED Light to light the way wherever you roam-from in-town adventures to backpacking trips. Attach the light just about anywhere-flexible strap wraps around a bike seatpost, bike handlebar, tent pole, tree limb, trekking pole or backpack D-ring. 2 LEDs provide steady or flashing illumination for up to 80 hrs. The Brunton Double-Back LED Light is powered by 2 CR2025 lithium batteries (included). Overstock.
short_description: Carry the versatile Brunton Double-Back LED Light to light the way wherever you roam-from in-town adventures to backpacking trips.
